content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) has an inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) has an inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found related to copper cable factory

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts (positions x=63.5 y=-53.5 and x=64.5 y=-53.5)


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a boiler and a power source before using it
### Errors when using electricity group without plugging into electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before using it
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
- Ensure that the pipe group has fluid before using it
### Errors when using belt group without items
- Ensure that the belt group has items before using it


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables defined by the agent were found in the execution logs.
